abstract: As it tries to fend off rivals like Google, Microsoft will provide a free online version of its new Office software.
snippet: As it tries to fend off rivals like Google, Microsoft will provide a free online version of its new Office software.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft has created a chimera in its new Office 2010 software, part desktop software and part Web app.

headline.main: Revamped Microsoft Office Will Be Free on the Web
headline.print_headline: Revamped Microsoft Office Will Be Free on the Web

abstract: Despite the influx of free online office suites, Microsoft’s Office cash machine keeps ringing up sales. Does Google have what it takes to blunt Office?
snippet: Despite the influx of free online office suites, Microsoft’s Office cash machine keeps ringing up sales. Does Google have what it takes to blunt Office?
lead_paragraph: Arriving at Google’s main campus the other day, I flipped my keys to the valet and hopped out of my car. I noticed a  modified RV  over on the right side of the parking lot where employees could get quick, free hair cuts.

headline.main: Office 2010: A Tale of Decadence and Hand-to-Hand Combat
